alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 2:03PM PST until February 15 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow showers in the area could result in brief periods of blowing snow, reducing visibility on roadways. Use caution when driving.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
